https://pypi.org/pypi/light_emoji#filesWelcome to ``light_emoji`` Documentation==============================================================================Documentation for ``light_emoji``... _install:Install------------------------------------------------------------------------------``light_emoji`` is released on PyPI, so all you need is:.. code-block:: console $ pip install light_emojiTo upgrade to latest version:.. code-block:: console $ pip install --upgrade light_emoji
